item.title: Introductions
item.description:
I'm Owen Tyme and I'm a novelist.

I prefers to write action-filled science fantasy, though I sometimes write fantasy or science fiction, when the inspiration takes me there. I love grounding what I write in science, even when writing about dragons, witches and wizards.

My favorite authors include Terry Pratchett, R. A. Salvatore, Douglas Adams and Isaac Asimov. More recently, I discovered a liking for Mercedes Lackey, as well. I loves novels grounded in scientific truth, but also love a little flight of fancy. I especially loves it when the two work hand-in-hand, as in the works of Pratchett.

Though I currently call Liberal, Kansas home, I was born in the California Bay Area. I've come to enjoy the mild climate of Kansas. I'm a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints.
